name: Nugifact
description:
This is a very early demo of the game Nugifact. The game Nugifact is all about exploring the world and its creatures, biomes, items and characters. If you want to progress and unlock more recipies you have to collect items.

Features
  • 60 different items
  • 38 different crafting recipies
  • 5 different charaters
  • Shops
  • 3 enemies, 2 friendly mobs, 1 boss
  • 3 biomes
  • 11 placeable items
  • Farming
  • Quests
